name: Hampton Inn & Suites Truckee
description: Hampton Inn & Suites Truckee offers reliable lodging with complimentary breakfast, indoor pool, and minutes from Old Greenwood, Northstar, Tahoe Donner, and Coyote Moon golf courses.
shortDescription: Reliable Truckee lodging with complimentary breakfast near 5+ championship golf courses.

roomTypes.name: Standard King Room
roomTypes.description: Clean and comfortable king room with Hampton's signature Clean and Fresh bed, complimentary WiFi, mini-fridge, microwave, and coffee maker.

roomTypes.name: Double Queen Room
roomTypes.description: Room with two queen beds, perfect for families or groups. Same Hampton standard amenities plus in-room safe.

roomTypes.name: King Studio Suite
roomTypes.description: Extended-stay suite with king bed, separate sitting area, sofa bed, microwave, and mini-fridge.

dining.name: Complimentary Hot Breakfast
dining.description: Hampton's signature free hot breakfast buffet served daily with eggs, waffles, bacon, fresh fruit, pastries, and coffee.

faqs.question: Does Hampton Inn Truckee include breakfast?
faqs.answer: Yes — complimentary hot breakfast is included daily for all guests, featuring eggs, waffles, bacon, fresh fruit, pastries, and coffee.

faqs.question: How far is Hampton Inn from the ski resorts?
faqs.answer: Northstar California is about 10 minutes away, Palisades Tahoe is approximately 20 minutes, and downtown Truckee is just 5 minutes.

faqs.question: Does Hampton Inn have a pool?
faqs.answer: Yes — an indoor heated pool and hot tub are available year-round.

meta.title: Hampton Inn Truckee CA | Hotel & Golf Packages
meta.description: Hampton Inn Truckee with complimentary breakfast and golf packages near Old Greenwood and Northstar.
